SLNG Privacy Policy

Last updated: October 27, 2025

Summary

This Privacy Policy explains how SLNG collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal information when using our app and services. We are committed to minimal and transparent data processing.

Data We Collect

  • Usage data: app interactions, performance, and diagnostics.
  • Device data: device model, OS version, and non-persistent identifiers.
  • Input content: text you type for detection/translation is processed temporarily to produce output and, by default, is not stored.
  • Account data (optional): if you sign up or subscribe to features, we may store the email or user ID required.

How We Use Data

  • Provide and improve SLNG services.
  • Detect technical issues and maintain security.
  • Service communications (e.g., updates, support).

Data Sharing

We do not sell your personal data. Data may be shared with trusted service providers (e.g., analytics and crash reporting) only as necessary and with adequate safeguards.

Storage & Retention

Data is retained only as long as necessary for the purposes described. By default, input content is processed transiently. If you create saved lists (e.g., favorites/private dictionary), that data remains until you delete it or close your account.

Security

We implement reasonable technical and organizational safeguards to protect data, including encryption in transit and access minimization practices.

Your Rights

  • Access, correction, or deletion of data.
  • Object to or withdraw certain consent.
  • Contact us for privacy questions or complaints.

Children

The service is not directed to children under 13 (or the applicable minimum age in your region). We do not knowingly collect children’s data; if we become aware, we will delete it.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Material changes will be announced in the app or on the site. The latest version is effective as of the date listed above.

Contact

For privacy inquiries, please contact us via the support email listed in the app.

Prepared in line with modern privacy guidelines and internal references (latest SLNG Privacy Policy).
